chapter.title: Get Started With Images
chapter.para: To start using the &CImA;, you must first authenticate with the Rackspace cloud. If you don't already have an authentication token and endpoint, see “Authenticate through the Rackspace Cloud Identity Service” before moving on.

Once you have authenticated, you may want to use images, importing, updating, and deleting your own images, and so on. You may also want to share your images with other users or use images that someone else has shared. The following sections provide the steps to performing these tasks, including cURL examples.

note.para: For more information on cURL, including exporting environment variables, see “How cURL Commands Work”.
